description.value: Flag an element so that any contained [`v-ka-input`](#https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#v-ka-input) elements do not trigger a RBLe calculation upon change.

Flag an element so that any contained [`v-ka-input`](#https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#v-ka-input) elements do not trigger a RBLe calculation upon change **and** are never submitted to an RBLe calculation.

Flag an element so that when any contained [`v-ka-input`](#https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#v-ka-input) elements are removed from the DOM, the associated [`state.inputs`](#https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#iapplicationdatainputs) value is also removed.

Flag an element so that any contained [`v-ka-input`](#https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#v-ka-input) elements allow for the KatApp framework to wire up all automatic processing.

Use the `v-pre` directive to an element that is used for [IModalOptions.contentSelector](https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#imodaloptionscontentselector) if the markup within the element should not be processed by the host application, but instead should be processed and become reactive when the modal application is created.

globalAttributes.name: v-scope
globalAttributes.description: Use v-scope to append a 'scope' to the currently running petite-vue scope.

globalAttributes.name: v-effect
globalAttributes.description: Use v-effect to execute **reactive** inline statements:

globalAttributes.name: v-if
globalAttributes.description: Conditionally render this element based on Vue expression.

globalAttributes.name: v-html
globalAttributes.description: Updated the element's InnerHTML with given Vue expression.

globalAttributes.name: v-text
globalAttributes.description: Updated the element's text content with given Vue expression.

globalAttributes.name: v-bind
globalAttributes.description: Dynamically bind one or more attributes to a Vue expression.  Prefer the :attributeName short-hand syntax.
Dynamically bind an attribute to a Vue expression.

globalAttributes.name: :class
globalAttributes.description: Dynamically bind the class attribute to a Vue expression.

globalAttributes.name: :data-
globalAttributes.description: Dynamically bind a data attribute to a Vue expression.

globalAttributes.name: v-for
globalAttributes.description: Render the element or template block multiple times based on the source data.

globalAttributes.name: v-on
globalAttributes.description: Attach an event listener to the element.  Prefer the @eventName short-hand syntax.

globalAttributes.name: @click
globalAttributes.description: Attach a click event listener to the element.

globalAttributes.name: @click.prevent
globalAttributes.description: Attach a click event listener to the element and prevent event bubbling.

globalAttributes.name: v-show
globalAttributes.description: Toggle the element's visibility based on the truthy-ness of the Vue expression value.

description.value:
Update element's innerHTML from designated RBLe Framework result. The v-ka-value directive is responsible for assigning element HTML content from the calculation results. It is simply a shorthand syntax to use in place of `v-html` and [`rbl.value()`](#https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#iapplicationdatarblvalue). The following statements are 'equivalent': `
` `
` `
` `
`

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-resource
globalAttributes.description: When a KatApp needs to support localization (different language translations), the `v-ka-resource` can work in conjunction with the [`IKatAppOptions.resourceStrings`](#https://github.com/terryaney/nexgen-documentation/blob/main/KatApp.Vue.md#ikatappoptions) to replace the element's `innerHTML` with a translated string.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-input
globalAttributes.description: Render input template or bind existing inputs to RBLe Framework calculations.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-input-group
globalAttributes.description: Render template representing multiple inputs of the same type and bind to RBLe Framework calculations.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-navigate
globalAttributes.description: Configure navigation within Kaml Views to other Kaml Views in Host Environment.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-template
globalAttributes.description: Render template with or without a data source; the data source can be an array rendering template content multiple times.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-api
globalAttributes.description: Configure a HTMLElement to submit to an api endpoint on click event.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-modal
globalAttributes.description: Configure a HTMLElement to open up a modal dialog (containing fixed markup or seperate Kaml View) on click.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-app
globalAttributes.description: Nest an instance of a seperate Kaml View within the current Kaml View (the KatApps will be isolated from each other).

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-table
globalAttributes.description: Render HTML tables automatically from the calculation results based on `text*` and `value*` columns.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-highchart
globalAttributes.description: Render Highcharts chart automatically from the calculation results.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-attributes
globalAttributes.description: Accepts a key/value space delimitted `string` of attributes and applies them to the current `HTMLElement`.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-needs-calc
globalAttributes.description: Control UI state when a submission form requires a RBLe Framework calculation before user can click the 'submit' button.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-inline
globalAttributes.description: Render raw HTML without the need for a `HTMLElement` 'container'.

globalAttributes.name: v-ka-nomount
globalAttributes.description: There are some situations where inputs should not be automatically processed (i.e. if a template has hidden inputs that are for internal use only - i.e. file upload templates). When an input should not be processed, the v-ka-nomount attribute can be applied to the input.
